title.content-text: 6.3.2 Protocol Operation of Sending and Receiving a Message

brief.content-text:
Diagram 3, Activity

The diagram depicts an activity in which you must match the host protocol and encapsulation terminology with the proper protocol or TCP/IP layer. Determine whether the terms below are related to the following protocols.

Note: Not all terms have a corresponding layer/protocol
TCP/IP Layer and Protocol
Application Layer/HHTP Protocol
Transport Layer/Transmission Control Protocol
Internetwork Layer/Internet Protocol
Network Access Layer/Ethernet Protocol

Terms
Packets
Web pages
HTML
Printer
Segments
Frames
Game console
IP address
Video card
MAC address
Printer
User Data
Video card
Laptop
Acknowledgments
